p: Munteanu et al. [ 259] prepared a nanocoating by encapsulating argan and clove oils into chitosan by coaxial electrospinning and then used it to functionalize electrospun PLA materials previously treated with CPT. The authors concluded that the electrospun coaxial encapsulation of clove and argan oils into chitosan led to enhanced antimicrobial activity against E. coli, S. typhymurium, and L. monocytogenes.
